snippet: Time generally marches slowly in the House of Lords, but on the issue of gay rights, it has sped up considerably.
abstract: London Journal; supporters and opponents gather in London's House of Lords to participate in two-day debate over bill to legalize same-sex marriage; meeting is noteworthy for softened tone toward subject as Lords' attitudes begin to move with public opinion; motion passes and will move to committee stage where it is almost certain to become law.
lead_paragraph: Time generally marches slowly in the House of Lords, but on the issue of gay rights, it has sped up considerably.

headline.seo: House of Lords Debates Gay-Marriage Bill
headline.main: Hidebound Chamber Lets Down Its Hair in Gay-Marriage Debate
headline.print_headline: Hidebound Chamber Lets Down Its Hair in Gay-Marriage Debate

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
